bibl.title: Seasons of Death for Donors and Testators.
Adam HYATT (Assistant Editor), Proceedings of the 25th International Congress of Papyrology. Ann Arbor, July 29 - August 4, 2007

series.title: American Studies in Papyrology. Special Edition

bibl.note: Complement to: IDEM, Gifts after Death in Greco-Roman Egypt, Proceedings of the 24th International Congress of Papyrology, Helsinki, 1-7 August, 2004. Volume II = Commentationes Humanarum Litterarum. 122, 2, 2007 (Helsinki, 2007) pp. 709-728. - Exposes one of the reasons for the immediate gift of ownership through the gift after death: namely, the donors' attempt to get rid of their liability to taxes and other charges on account of the property divided.
